Contributor.Organization: HCI - Helmholtz Centre for Infection Research

Column.Name: Organism
Column.Description: organism source of the feature

Column.Name: RANGE_GB
Column.Description: chromosome accession and version upon which probes are mapped

Column.Name: RANGE_START
Column.Description: start position of mapped probe relative to RANGE_GB

Column.Name: RANGE_END
Column.Description: end position of mapped probe relative to RANGE_GB

Column.Name: RANGE_STRAND
Column.Description: chromosomal stand

Column.Name: Gene Title
Column.Description: Titel of gene represented by the probe set

Column.Name: ORF
Column.Description: open reading frame

Column.Name: Gene Symbol
Column.Description: genes symbol, when one is available from UniGene

Column.Name: Description
Column.Description: description

Column.Name: SPOT_ID
Column.Description: alternative spot identifer, identifies controls

Sample.Title: Null glnR_18h_A

Channel.Growth-Protocol: minimal medium with nitrate; incubated for 18 hours
Channel.Label: biotin
Channel.Label-Protocol: Biotinylated cDNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 microg total RNA (Prokaryotic Expression Analysis, Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Following fragmentation, 4 microg of cDNA were hybridized for 16 hr at conditions recommended by the manufacturer. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GCS 3000.
Sample.Data-Processing: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 150.

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: MAS5-calculated Signal intensity

Column.Name: ABS_CALL
Column.Description: the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), marginal (M), or no call (NC)

Column.Name: DETECTION P-VALUE
Column.Description: 'detection p-value', p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

Series.Title: Expressionprofiling of a glnR-mutant of Mycobacterium tuberculosis during culture on nitrate
Series.Summary:
Identification of glnR-dependent regulation of nitrate assimilation
Keywords: genetic modification
Series.Overall-Design: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv wild type and glnR mutant strain were incubated in minimal medium supplemented with 5 mM NO3 for 18 and 48 hours. RNA was extracted at indicated time points and microarray analysis was performed. Experiments were repeated once. As we wanted to focus on genes that were regulated steadily over time, data obtained from time points 18 hours and 48 hours were grouped. Thus for wild type and mutant, four independent data sets were obtained each, and compared using t-test statistics.
